Package noteApp.controller

Class ControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • noteApp.controller.ControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    public class ControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    Represents the Controller portion of the MVC model. Used to pass data between the Model and the View.
    Author:
    Matias Vainio, Eric Keränen, Jere Salmensaari, Teemu Viljanen, Nico Järvinen

      • logOut

        public boolean logOut()
        Logs current user out of the application. Also disables auto save thread and empties the saveable note.
        Specified by:
        logOut in interface Controller
        Returns:
        true if the log out procedure is successful.

      • saveToDatabase

        public Note saveToDatabase​(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String text)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new note and saves it to the database. Content of the note is crypted before it gets transferred to the database.
        Specified by:
        saveToDatabase in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        name - title of the note.
        text - content of the note.
        Returns:
        Note note which has been saved to db.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception with a message.
